'''Rocking Carriage''' is a part of the [[Chromatic Ode of Candies and Roses]] event in [[Version 5.1]].

It is unlocked after completing the {{Quest|Rocking Carriage}} and accessed by talking to [[Masud]] at the {{Icon|Dialogue Rocking Carriage}} icon.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Chromatic Ode of Candies and Roses Rocking Carriage 1.png
|text1    = While the Flower Carriage is in motion, you can change its route to avoid obstacles. The Flower Carriage will {{Color|help|lose}} HP when it hits any obstacles, and if HP is fully depleted, you will fail the challenge. Additionally, collect as many flowers as possible to fulfill the score requirements.
|image2   = Tutorial Chromatic Ode of Candies and Roses Rocking Carriage 2.png
|text2    = The Flower Carriage will {{Color|help|automatically collect}} nearby flowers for a time after you collect a {{Color|help|Clustered Blessing}}.
|image3   = Tutorial Chromatic Ode of Candies and Roses Rocking Carriage 3.png
|text3    = The flowers you obtain will grant you {{Color|help|bonus points}} for some time after obtaining a {{Color|help|Blooming Boon}}.
|image4   = Tutorial Chromatic Ode of Candies and Roses Rocking Carriage 4.png
|text4    = The Flower Carriage will become {{Color|help|immune}} to the negative effects of collisions with obstacles for some time after obtaining a {{Color|help|Buttressing Blessing}}.
|image5   = Tutorial Chromatic Ode of Candies and Roses Rocking Carriage 5.png
|text5    = In some stages, the Flower Carriage will {{Color|help|continuously accelerate}} up to top speed if it hits no obstacles for a while.
|image6   = Tutorial Chromatic Ode of Candies and Roses Rocking Carriage 6.png
|text6    = The stage "A Gorgeous, Lovely, Endless Journey!" is an endless, cyclical stage. The Flower Carriage will keep proceeding onward, facing speedier, tougher challenges. {{Color|help|You can end the challenge whenever you wish.}}
}}

==Stages==
{{Description|A game run by the "Phantom Toy Master" Masud that is imbued with a heartwarming fairytale- "Smart or not, nice or naughty, every child with a good heart will receive their own Flower Carriage during the Sabzeruz Festival celebrations..."
"Riding in their carriage, the children shall embark on unique adventures, encountering and overcoming danger, and finding the greatest treasure, a thousand blooming flowers..."|Map Marker Description}}
